Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
Hello! I have a rough, bumpy skin patch on my left upper arm that has grown larger and started to hurt recently.
How long have you had this skin patch for?
I've had the skin patch for a few months.
Has the color of the skin patch changed over time?
No, I did not mention any change in the color of the skin patch over time.
Does the patch bleed or ooze any fluid?
Yes, the patch does ooze a pus-like fluid when touched.
Do you have any personal or family history of skin conditions or other relevant health issues?
No, I do not have any relevant medical history or family history of skin conditions.
Have you been exposed to any new products, environments, or allergens that could have triggered this reaction?
No, I have not been exposed to any new products, environments, or allergens recently.
Is the skin patch warm to the touch compared to the surrounding area?
I didn't mention any warmth of the skin patch compared to the surrounding area.

No, I have not used any medications or treatments for this skin patch.
Final Diagnosis: Keratoacanthoma
